ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // {CHOICE}Car #4: Locked Down
Upgrading to maximum security alert!!
fade({r:255, g:0, b:0, speed:64, type:9, adjust:255});
fade({r:210, g:170, b:170, speed:64, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:200, g:200, b:200, speed:32, type:10, adjust:0});
fade({r:160, g:160, b:160, speed:128, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:128, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:160, g:160, b:160, speed:128, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:128, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cloud}
“Too late for that now.
Why'd you come along anyway?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“You don't care if I go first?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:18}); // {Cloud}
“…You look great, just like a man.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“Just concentrate on our plan.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Barret}
“Yo!!
Ain't no time to waste!!”{PAUSE}“…Do something!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“All right!!
We made it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“Let's go!!
We're gonna dive outta here!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“Hey you two!
There ain't no time for that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“A leader always stays till the end.”{PAUSE}“Don't worry 'bout me, just go!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Barret}
“Later!
You take care of the rest!”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“Yeah!!
I've made up my mind!”{PAUSE}“Watch closely.
I'm gonna jump!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // Wedge
“I look just like my little brother
in these clothes…”{PAUSE}“I wonder how everyone is now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // Wedge
“Guess who?
It's me, Wedge!”{PAUSE}“Looks like things were a success.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // Jessie
“Yay!! I'm so happy
{OK}…I think?”

dialogStrings: Inside Train

Last train out of Sector 8 Station.
Last stop is Sector 7, Train Graveyard.
Expected time arrival is 12:23AM,
Midgar Standard Time…

{CHOICE}Level 4 Warning!!
{CHOICE}Car #4: Lock Down

{CHOICE}Car #4: Locked Down
Upgrading to maximum security alert!!

{Barret}
“All right!!
We made it!”

{Barret}
“Yo!!
This way!!”

{Barret}
“Let's go!!
We're gonna dive outta here!!”

{Tifa}
“…Scary…huh.”

{Cloud}
“Too late for that now.
Why'd you come along anyway?”

{Tifa}
“Because…”

{Barret}
“Hey you two!
There ain't no time for that!”

{Tifa}
“Yeah!!
I've made up my mind!”{PAUSE}“Watch closely.
I'm gonna jump!!”

{Cloud}
“You don't care if I go first?”

{Barret}
“A leader always stays till the end.”{PAUSE}“Don't worry 'bout me, just go!”

{Barret}
“Yo!
Don't go gettin' your spikey-ass hurt!”{PAUSE}“It's only the beginnin' of the mission!”

Wedge
“Guess who?
It's me, Wedge!”{PAUSE}“Looks like things were a success.”

Wedge
“I look just like my little brother
in these clothes…”{PAUSE}“I wonder how everyone is now?”

Jessie
“It's me, Jessie.
How do I look, {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“Do I look good in a Shinra uniform?”
{CHOICE}Yeah…
{CHOICE}Not now

{Cloud}
“…You look great, just like a man.”

{Cloud}
“Just concentrate on our plan.”

Jessie
“Yay!! I'm so happy
{OK}…I think?”

Jessie
“You're right, sorry.”

Biggs
“I always wanted to dress up like this.”

{Barret}
“Yo!!
Ain't no time to waste!!”{PAUSE}“…Do something!”
“Whew--!!”

{Barret}
“Later!
You take care of the rest!”
